casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tony Allen WALKER. No. 282P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of June 2004 by Defendant for Appointment of Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
